datasets.name: Mapping Files
datasets.description: Folder containing MapMyCells precomputed stats h5 and marker genes json

datasets.name: Barcodes CSV
datasets.help_text: This csv is required if running domain detection (used to dispatch jobs and load detected transcripts from S3 bucket). Required columns are "barcode", "dataset_id", "experiment_id", "region" (if modality is MERSCOPE)
